extendedInfo.description: Enjoy the convenience, security and ease of doing your banking right from your mobile device. You can check your account balances, transfer funds, view recent activity, receive alerts, find ATMs or banking centers - even make check deposits from your phone.To get started, download and launch the app. Then sign on with your Armed Forces Bank Online Banking Access ID and Password. Itâs that simple.Monitor Your Account - See account balances and transaction historyPerform Transactions- Pay bills- Transfer money between Armed Forces Bank accounts- Place a stop paymentMake Check Deposits- Make check deposits with your phone Find Branch Locations and ATMs- Find the nearest Armed Forces Bank banking center locations & ATMs- Speak with a bank representativeAlerts- Balance level alerts:  let you know when you have gone above or dipped below your pre-selected amount. - Transaction alerts:  let you know when specific transaction activity occurs on your account. - Scheduled alerts:  send you the latest information on your available balance and recent account history.Safe and SecureArmed Forces Bank is committed to your security and protecting the privacy of your financial information. We use state of the art technology to protect unauthorized access to your account, your wireless communication is securely encrypted, and your personal information is not stored on your phone. Have Questions?  Call 1-888-929-2265 Armed Forces Bank â Member FDIC

reviews.title: What???
reviews.comment: It should not take 8 attempts to deposit one check. This is supposed to mk banking easy. Epic fail in that dept!
reviews.author: cj thompson

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: App itself is ok, but check depositing feature is terrible. The app overrides the camera making for horrible picture quality. Thereby resulting in not being able to deposit anything at all.
reviews.author: Jon Duchene

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait to try our snap shot deposit tomorrow! Works great. They did an update last night too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Never again
reviews.comment: Scan check for deposit on this app.  The bank took the money from the other account and didn\'t deposit it into the account needed.  The \"support\" center said that no matter how many times that account was verified they still had to check.  It could take the usual 10 days they said...however they already deposited the check in the other account and took the money out but I can\'t get it till the 10 days is up.  Never use this app again and will be changing banks.
reviews.author: Jo Richards

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: Finally my account info at the touch of my screen and as an added plus I don\'t have to hear that annoying automated voice system because of calling in. this is fabulous thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Armed Forces Bank App
reviews.comment: I really like this app!! I haven\'t used the deposit check function yet. Having everything readily accessible is very convienent :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: App is awesome. I prefer to bank from my phone, i pay my bills from my phone ect. Way to get with the times afb
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix it
reviews.comment: This app doesnt work good im trying to log in from 3 days ago it dont let me do it...it doesnt read the checks when you are trying to deposit it
reviews.author: Cositas Bellas

reviews.title: Love!
reviews.comment: User friendly and perfect credit not required for deposit capability!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Remote Deposit Capture Impossible
reviews.comment: I am new to the  bank and I can tell you, this is one of the worst Apps in the financial services industry. With one of the top 5 smartphones on the market, I have two sharp cameras and was appalled at the quality of images the apps yields, having over-ridden the camera. Plus, I had no way to put a \"period\" in the \" amount\", making banking virtually impossible.  Customer service could not help. They speculated about the phone...no, because it works with other financial institutions, seamlessly!  Prince Harry
reviews.author: chapa paka

reviews.title: Quite Amazing!
reviews.comment: This app is amazing. Easy access, simple to use, and very modern. Couldn\'t be more happier with this release!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank goodness for this APP!!!!
reviews.comment: This is the only bank ever that it takes over a half hour to talk to a associate!! Get this- I can sign into the app but no matter what they say I can\'t sign in through the web!! After hours of being on HOLD. I\'ve just learned to accept the fact that 1) you can\'t talk to anyone  2) you\'re website really is horrible   But the wait time needs to be fixed. Are y\'all short on employee\'s? I\'ve had my account for 10 months and not 1 time has my wait time been less than 30 minutes! THE MOBILE DEPOSIT IS WONDERFUL!
reviews.author: Melissa Pick

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: I have had this App for a few months now and I have never had any issues.   The mobile deposit feature has improved my life significantly and thanks to the feature I have not needed to go in to a branch for a few months now!  Thanks for a great App!
reviews.author: Jeff Irwin

reviews.title: About time
reviews.comment: Finally an app for my bank that US not third party and runs well. Well done AFB
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: About time!!!
reviews.comment: Love it. Easy to use and up to date. Thank u armed forces bank. Now I don\'t have to try and find a computer to access my account.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: You can NEVER get a hold of a real person but this app more than makes up for it. It allows quick access to my account and the ability to do what I need too. If you access your banking information on your cell a lot this is the PERFECT APP!!
reviews.author: Papi Chulo

reviews.title: Snapshot deposit
reviews.comment: Have an 8MP camera and every time I take a crisp picture, it\'s like they put a blurry filter on it. Worthless application.
reviews.author: Keith Edgeworth II

reviews.title: What happened
reviews.comment: Used to work great now it won\'t open
reviews.author: Bryon Torchia

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: Downloaded this app I cant use the deposit check pic caputure it keeps saying you dont have a regestered rdc account.waste of time afb needs to get it rite
reviews.author: Ryan Walk

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy 4
reviews.comment: Great app!  Works flawlessly.
reviews.author: Keysha Fowler
